1.content:
You have now entered the world of plagues. Now before you all get off and start writing...what sort of virus has infected the world?

Expanditis: A disease that causes the infected to rapidly gain weight and have an increase in appetite. Transmitted through saliva and bites.

Size Disorder A disease that alters the infected's size in some way. Size Disorder S causes the infected to shrink and Size Disorder G causes growth. Caution: those with G have more heightened emotions.

Gender Bender Virus: A disease that changes the gender of those who contract it. Gender Bender Virus B changes women into men, men are unaffected. Gender Bender Virus G changes men into women, women are unaffected.

Ageitis: A disease that directly effects the aging process. Those with the R strain slowly grow younger until they either hit childhood or baby age. P strain makes them grow older until they eventually die of old age.

Be sure you choose wisely because once you pick a virus, there is no adding any of the others.

15.content:
Blue Fever: Those who have contracted this disease find themselves turning blue as their bodies slowly fill out with a strange substance called juice. Touching or drinking the juice is highly ill advised as the juice contains the virus.

Toonmonia: A bizarre disease that changes a persons entire physiology, transforming them into a living cartoon. Starts with sneezing until they become a full toon. What kind they become is based on personality.

Clown Flu: A disease that disrupts a persons train of thought while coloring their skin a chalk white and increase growth in their nose and feet as well as other funny changes.

Anthropomophism: A bizarre disease that causes those who catch it to slowly change into anthro animals.

They hide out in the desert
Another truck chases after them
15521111312123112233333.content:
However, during the whole hour they were driving, Marks did not show a single sign of changing as they drove farther and farther out. "Well...when are the changes supposed to happen? Is it like time released or what?" Marks asked.

"From all the cases, the changes happen the moment the subject is like kissed or had the night of their lives." Marsha said. "If you haven't changed...Cane...kiss her!" Marsha said.

"What? I don't swing like that." Cane said.

"Just do it. You're as infectious as all of us right now." Marsha said.

"Fine." Cane said kissing Marks right on the lips. Marks spat out the kiss as soon as it happened.

"Ew. So sweet it stinks." Marks said.

"And she didn't change once." Marsha said. "That proves it. You're immune to Bimboitis."

"What? For real?" Marks said shocked.

"I'm like totally shocked as you. To think there was a woman who was like never gonna get dumb like us. Ugh. You're the key to the cure. We don't need patient zero if we have someone immune." Marsha said as they kept driving.
15521111312123112233333.title: A Possible Immunity

choices: "...we need a sample of Patient Zero's blood."
"...we need at least 10 different infected blood samples."
"...we need equipment this lab doesn't have."
155211113121231122333331.content:
Eventually, the truck stopped at an old lab on the outskirts of the city. Cane and Marks got off the truck, and helped Marsha off as well. Cane went off to look for something Marsha could use to carry her boobs, while the truck driver, a woman around Marsha's age, walked up to them.

"Thanks for the lift... Um, what's your name?" Marsha asked.

"Private White." White replied. "I was doing repairs on the truck when I heard the alarm. Got in the truck before any of the infected got in. So, I overheard your conversation. You're really immune, General Marks?"

"Seems so, and thank God for that." Marks replied. "Marsha here still has some of her brain, so with my immunity, we might be able to find a cure for this."

Cane returned with a utility cart, and helped ease Marsha's bust into it. With that taken care of, the four entered the lab.
------
The lab was totally empty, which meant no chance for another outbreak. Once they got set up in the main lab, and confirmed the machinery still worked, Marsha got to work. She took a sample of Marks's blood, and began examineing it. After about a half-hour, Marsha looked up from her work.

"So, like, you want the good news, or the bad news?" Marsha asked.

"The good news." Marks replied.

"Like, we can make a cure with your blood. It won't fix the physical changes, but it can at least stop us from becoming total airheads, and it, like, totes wipes out infectivity."

"That's great." Marks said. "What's the bad news?"

Marsha frowned. "To make the cure..."
155211113121231122333331.title: The Old Lab

choices: Lure her out with Marks
Offer to give her the cure
Convince her to let them join her.
1552111131212311223333311.content:
"I'm sorry but I think I might have misheard you." Cane said.

"No. I'm totes serious. I need a sample of Mimi's blood in order to make this work." Marsha said.

"But why? You said Marks blood could be used for a cure." Cane said.

"It can but in order to make sure for a complete eradication of the virus from the subjects...I'll need a unique strange, er strand from a subject. Specifically...a bimbo who has a hot bod and like all her smarty smarts." Marsha said.

"So in a sense, we can't save the world without blood from Marsha. Would it be okay to just kill her outright?" Marks asked.

"No arguments about it. She would likely try and repeat all of this again anyway. Totes uncool." Marsha said before groaning. "We'll need to do it fast. I can feel my brain slowly melting away. We need her here now."

"But how are we going to do that? No way she's going to let us anywhere near the base when she just took it over and made it her penthouse." Marks said.

"We don't have to go on in...we just need to lure her out." Marsha said.
1552111131212311223333311.title: The Immune and the Diseased

choices: "...you'll have to try harder then that."
"...I'm sending someone to get you. I don't fully trust you."
"...I'll be down shortly."
15521111312123112233333113.content:
"I think I have a totes awesome idea on how to lure out Mimi." Marsha said. "If we, like, convince her that we want to join her in her crusade, we should be able to get close enough to get blood sample. And, like, we won't have to kill anyone."

"That sounds like a plan." Marks said. "But how do we do that?"

"We just call her, and tell her we changed our minds." Marsha said. "She'll probably come down personally to, like, collect us."

"Then I can deal with the lunatic myself, get that blood sample, and stop the virus once and for all." Marks said.

"Correctamundo!" Marsha yelled, before realizing what she just said. "Please, like, smack me if I ever say that again."

"White, you go and hide. I'm immune, but your probably not, so we can't risk you being infected." Marks said. White nodded, and ran off. Marks sighed. "Alright, I'll call the base, and you talk to her."

Marks and Marsha then walked up to a phone on the wall, and picked it up. She dialed the number of the base, and handed the phone. After a few rings, there was an answer.

"Mimi speaking." Mimi said on the other end.

"Mimi? It's, like, Marsha." Marsha replied. "We changed our mind. We think what your doing is totes hot, and we wanna join!" It was a blatant lie, but she hoped Mimi would buy it.

There was silence on the other end, as if Mimi was thinking. Marsha was worried. Mimi was smart, so she might not fall for the lie. Eventually, Mimi finally answered.

"Marsha." Mimi said "..."
15521111312123112233333113.title: Pretend to Join

choices: Kill Mimi
Stop the transports
155211113121231122333331132.content:
"Right..." Marsha said as they hung up.

A while later, a bimbo approached the lab before being captured and trapped inside of a makeshift cell.

"Well so much for that plan. Guess the virus is affecting my ability to think things through." Marsha sighed. "She's like...never going to come to us now."

"So we go with the original plan. Luckily...I know how it'll be done." Marks said before Cane saw something on TV.

"Uh...girls? Like...look at this." Cane said as they looked on TV and saw a few bimbos taking away a few planes and landing them near the base as some others were commandeering some boats.

"Damn. I was like afraid of this. They're getting ready to like, go viral...I mean global. No viral works too." Marsha said. "If they go global, the world will be one dummy after another and Mimi gets her way."

"Like I said...we go with the original plan. We blow a hole in her head and get this whole thing over with." Marks said.

Marsha sighed. "Okay. Options are limited but...we have no choice."
155211113121231122333331132.title: Failed Trap.

choices: ...works perfectly. Her mind and speech are normal again.
...works partially. Her mind is cured, but the speech remains.
...returns her mind, but causes even more boob growth.
1552111131212311223333311322.content:
"We CANNOT let the infected get out of the US." Marsha said. "We, like, need to find some way to stop them from leaving."

"Already on that." Marks said, as she immediately began dialing a number. "I've got some friends in high places who aren't infected. Besides, I really doubt they know how to fly planes or use boats. Look at the TV again."

Marsha and Cane did just that. They saw uninfected people being pulled out of the transports. Pilots and boat captains, who were then almost immediately infected, along with anyone unlucky enough to be on the planes or boats.

"Oh! Like, duh!" Marsha said. "They can't use those transports without someone smart enough to control them. That should buy us about... um...uh... tons of time!"

"Right. I've got some other ideas too." Marks said, as she heard someone pick up the phone on the other end. "Hey, Hicks. It's Marks. Can you get the Air Force to do something for me?"
------
About an hour later, Marsha was hard at work in the lab. Marks had convinced the Air Force, the NAVY, and the general Army to cut off all borders exiting the US to stop the infection. It would take some time, but since very few of the infected could use a plane or boat, they had plenty of time.

"Marsha, how's that test cure coming?" Marks asked.

"Totally dunzo!" Marsha said. "I can't wipe out the infection, but I can at least stop my mind from totally bimbofying!"

"You're, like, sure it'll work?" Cane asked.

"I hope." Marsha said, before injecting the cure into herself.

"Dr. Smith!" Marks yelled.

"Chillax." Marsha said. "No better test subject then myself." She could feel the cure having an effect on her. The cure...
1552111131212311223333311322.title: No Exit for the Virus

choices: Create a rival queen
send a kill signal on the wavelength she's using
15521111312123112233333113222.content:
She blinked for a moment before sighing. "Sweet sweet thoughts. I'm like so glad you're back." Marsha sighed. "While my way of speaking is like still totes messed up." she groaned.

"At least your brain isn't turning to mush anymore." Marks said.

"Yes. While not a full cure. It should at least keep me from deteriorating into like a hot girl with a smokin pair on her." Marsha said as she groaned. "This is not going to be totes easy to get used to."

"Okay. So the army guys have like grounded all the planes and boats and totally captured the infected trying to like take them." Cane said.

"That's good. Now...next problem...we need to deal with Mimi. She was able to control those bimbos into doing that. No way they were smart enough to know about the rest of the world." Marks said.

"Unless...hivemind!" Marsha said. "Think about it. Bees like have hives. But Mimi is Patient Zero. She could have like, made herself like a queen. She can easily control those she herself has infected."

"But then its impossible to beat her then." Marks said.

"Not quite. We can if we..."
15521111312123112233333113222.title: Partial Success

choices: "If you insist."
"I'm not putting you at risk."
155211113121231122333331132221.content:
"A... rival queen?" Marks asked, confused.

"Yeah. If we, like, get the original virus, we can use that to make an new Patient Zero. That should totally confuse the infected." Marsha said. "We get them outta the way, we can get to Mimi no problem."

"That sounds like a good plan, but we have three problems." Marks said. "One, we don't know where Mimi made the original virus. Two, we don't even know if using the originl virus will have that effect. And three, who the hell are we gonna use as a rival queen?"

"Well, I just stopped my mind from going all mushy, so I'm out. And you're immune Marks, so you're a no-go. That leaves Cane, or White." Marsha said.

It was at that moment White returned to the room. She had heard most of the conversation.

"I'll do it." White said. "I'm willing to sacrifice myself for the good of the world."

"You're not dying, babe." Marsha said. "You're just gonna turn into a total hottie with a bangin' bod."

"...right." White replied, not sure how to react to that.

"OK, we got a potential queen. We still need that original virus." Marks said. "You think it might be in the original penthouse, or with Mimi herself?"

"Well, Mimi already infected herself, so she, like, probably didn't need it anymore." Marsha said. "So it's probably in her old penthouse."

"Right, I'll go there and look for it, since I'm immune." Marks replied.

"Wait, I'm coming too." Marsha said. "I wanna study how she originally made the virus!"

Marks looked at Marsha, and replied with...
155211113121231122333331132221.title: Rival Queen Bee

choices: Found a formula sheet
Found a tape containing Mimi's logs
found a beaker with a small amount of the original virus
1552111131212311223333311322211.content:
"Fine but stay close. We have no idea what we might encounter." Marks said as the two of them headed out.

It wasn't too long before they returned to the pent house in the city and found it completely barren. "Looks like our queen bee is like totally gone." Marsha said.

"Probably ditched the place the moment she took over our base. Though seems she lived in quite the luxury." Marks said. "But this place looks normal. No sign of a lab anywhere."

"Not necessarily. We thinky girls...I mean scientists. We tend to work in secret. Its not like, gonna be exposed like my boobies. She'd like have it hidden...right here." Marsha said tilting a painting as a doorway opened up in the wall.

They headed down the stairs before finding an entire lab set up in what appeared to be a secret subterranean lair.

"Wow...talk about going all out with the classics." Marks said looking around.

"Hmm...some of these are like, totally covered in dust." Marsha said before noticing something in the trash. She looked in and...
1552111131212311223333311322211.title: The Bimbo and the Soldier

choices: "...see if the lab has a secret passage."
"...try to escape through the next building."
"...hide you in my cleavage, and I'll pretend to be fully turned."
15521111312123112233333113222112.content:
"Hey, look at this." Marsha said, pulling out what looked like a box of cassett tapes. "Maybe these'll tell us about Mimi."

Marks looked around the room, and found a cassett player. She and Marsha walked over to the player. Marsha opened the box of tapes. There were only 3 inside, each with a date on it. Marks took the earliest labeled tape, placed it in the player, and hit play. Instantly, the tape starting playing.

'These are the research notes of Doctor Miriam Whickland. I've been working on a formula that will hopefully revolutionize the cosmetics market. This formula will allow women to reshape their bodies into any shape, giving them the dream body they alway wanted. With this, I can hopefully cut down on dangerous surgeries, and help women look their best.'

"So, Mimi- er, Miriam, was lying about her original intentions?" Marks asked. "Why?"

"Maybe the next tape'll tell us." Marsha said, taken the next tape out of the box. She ejected the first tape, placed the second in, and hit play.

'The formula. Something's... wrong with it. It reshapes bodies, yes, but it forcibly changes the body into a hyper-sexualized one. Not only that, but it causes sever mental decay, and increases sexual urges to insane levels. This is... fascinating. I'm going to work more on the formula, see if I can fix these issues.'

"So the whole turning into a sex-crazed bimbo was an accident?" Marks asked, now concerned.

Marsha took the latest tape out, ejected the second tape, put the latest one in, and hit play.

'This is Miriam... no, this is Mimi. I injected myself with the formula. I look absolutely gorgeous, and I'm still a genius. I think I'm going to enjoy this. I'm going to invite some friends over to show off the new me, and hopefully have a night of fun.'

"Well, we know where Mimi came from now." Marks said. "But where's the formula?"

Marsha looked around, and saw a book on the nearby table. Going over to it, she opened it and saw the formula.

"Right here!" Marsha said. "Let's get going!" She then stuffed the book into her 4 foot cleavage, and both she and Marks exited the lab and re-entered the penthouse.

As they did, Marks looked out the window, and became worried.

"Um, Marsha, we have a problem." Marks said, pointing out the window. They were several floors up, but on the ground Marks could see an entire horde of infected. They likely weren't being controlled by Mimi, but it was still a problem.

"Crap!" Marsha yelled. "We, like, can't go in that horde. I might get infected again, and turn into a total airhead!" She then thought for a moment. "I have a plan. Let's..."
15521111312123112233333113222112.title: Dr. Miriam Whickland

choices: They create the serum and help arrives
They create the serum but Mimi arrives with her army
155211113121231122333331132221122.content:
"What? Is that even possible given your..." Marks said.

"It'll be fine. The roof is right next to an office building. Those are made of glass. If you ride on my breasts, we can like, glide like a birdie." Marsha said.

"But won't we get cut up by millions of glass shards?" Marks asked.

"We will get a few cuts and scrapes but the only way to access is like, with the magic box, I mean elevator." Marsha said. "Just ride and be ready to like...jump with it." she giggled.

The two of them headed up to the roof as they got the cart in position. Marks climbed up on top of Marsha's breasts as the two of them charged at the window at high speed, leading right off the building and through the window, shattering it into a million pieces as they crash landed right in the middle of a work station. "Thank god the city was blocked off." Marks said.

"Okay we should like be totally safe up here until I can like make the bimbo juice. Ugh. Serum! God I hate my voice now." Marsha said as she headed over to the break room to work with what they had.
155211113121231122333331132221122.title: Bimbo Skating

info.brief_description: A brand new epidemic sweeps across the world and how it reacts all depends on you.
info.description:
A brand new virus has just been released into the world and its about to cause a lot of strange things to happen. How will you handle it? Will you be a doctor trying to cure the disease, some bystander trying to survive, or one of the infected trying to spread the virus as far as they can. You decide.

Rules:

You can only use one virus per path.

A minimum of 1000 characters per addition.

And...I think thats it for now so...have fun.
